mapper.select: select * from favorite_tb where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId};
mapper.delete: delete from favorite_tb where product_id = #{productId} AND user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select pt.product_id, pt.title, pt.price, pt.status, pt.category, pt.condition_grade, pt.trade_type, pt.create_dt, pit.image_url as thumbnail, ft.create_dt as favorite_dt from favorite_tb ft join product_tb pt on pt.product_id = ft.product_id left join ( select product_id, image_url from ( select product_id, image_url, ROW_NUMBER() over ( partition by product_id order by thumbnail desc, create_dt asc, product_image_id asc ) rn from product_image_tb ) t where rn = 1 )pit on pit.product_id = pt.product_id where ft.user_id = #{userId} and (#{cursorProductId} is null or ft.create_dt < #{cursorFavoriteDt} or (ft.create_dt = #{cursorFavoriteDt} and ft.product_id < #{cursorProductId}) ) order by ft.create_dt desc, ft.product_id desc limit #{limit};
